long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Record your screen and camera with one click. Save to your local computer.

Snapcastify is a free screen recording tool. 

With Snapcastify you can record your screen and instantly get a link to download share with anyone. It’s the fastest and easiest way to screen capture and stay connected with users. Whether you’re screen recording a product demo, giving feedback, or simply sharing your thoughts, Snapcastify makes it simple.
